item.title: Take a Screenshot and upload to Cloudinary using Bash Scripts
item.description: Introduction In this article, I will introduce HOW TO take a screenshot and upload screenshot to cloudinary. Cloudinary will return the image URL and put it into your clipboard. So, you can directly paste image URL using Control+v. Cloudinary is an amazing image hosting service. We can upload all of our published image to WWW and save our local disk memory. Let’s we do it now! Pre-reading Linux/Pipe to/from the clipboard in a Bash script Linux/Managing Your Dotfiles With Git and Make Pre-installion maim: take screenshots tool xclip: clipboard Python >= 3.
